name: Prepare to be spooky
description:
Horror ! Your soul is trapped  in this cemetery, rise and defeat your foes to retrieve your soul and be free ! And don't forget the most important: to be spooky !

---CONTROLS---

Keyboard:

Move: ZQSD or WASD, and Arrows

Jump: Space bar

Attack: Enter

---INFOS---

More features are coming !

-New content (levels, bosses, mechanics)

-More particles (especially for breaking walls and when zombies appear)
